eas_text: A civil authority has issued A FIRE WARNING for the following counties or areas: Inyo, CA; at 11:32 AM ON JAN 8, 2026 Effective until 11:32 AM JAN 9, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Evacuation Warning in place for the Granite View area in place due to a rapidly growing wildfire in the area. Residents who need additional time  to evacuate or have large animals should should leave the area now
